Title: Ice Cream Truck
Plot: Geo is meeting his friend Dylan so they can go meet the ice cream truck and get some ice cream treats, but when they get to the corner, they find out that the ice cream truck is missing!  Geo meets up with Milli and Bot, and they set out to find the missing truck. Before the day is through, they locate the stranded truck, fix its flat tire and hop inside to make enough ice cream pizzas for Dylan and his friends.
